name: Core Release 30.1.0
description: We have released another version of the core release! This core release brings improvements to our few APIs.

IMPROVED.text:
Now, you can pass the SocialAppName parameter in our following Native Access Token APIs. Allowing you to configure multiple apps for the same social provider.
Access Token via Google Token
Access Token via Google AuthCode
Access Token via LinkedIn Token
Access Token via Facebook Token
Access Token via Twitter Token
Access Token via Apple ID Code
Added isWeb parameter in Refresh Token API, allowing you to specify if its Web or Native Access Token.
